alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 09 at 8:44PM EST until January 09 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 7, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA BERTIE CAMDEN CHOWAN CURRITUCK GATES HERTFORD PASQUOTANK PERQUIMANS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF CHESAPEAKE CITY OF FRANKLIN CITY OF HAMPTON CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS CITY OF NORFOLK CITY OF POQUOSON CITY OF PORTSMOUTH CITY OF SUFFOLK CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG ISLE OF WIGHT JAMES CITY SOUTHAMPTON SURRY YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AHOSKIE, BACONS CASTLE, BARHAM, BOOTH FORK, BOWERS HILL, BOYKINS, BUSCH GARDENS, CAPE COLONY, CENTERVILLE, CHESAPEAKE AIRPORT, CHIPPOKES STATE PARK, CHRISTENSONS CORNER, COURTLAND, CROAKER, CURRITUCK, DEEP CREEK, EDENHOUSE, EDENTON, ELIZABETH CITY, EWELL, FENTRESS, FIVE FORKS, FRANKLIN, GATESVILLE, GREAT BRIDGE, GREENBRIER, GROVE, GWALTNEY CORNER, HAMPTON, HANCOCK, HERTFORD, HOG ISLAND GAME RESERVE, HORSESHOE, HUNTERDALE, IVOR, LILLY, MACEDONIA, MAVATON, MERRY HILL, MIDWAY, MOUNT PLEASANT, NEWPORT NEWS, NORFOLK, POOLESVILLE, POQUOSON, PORTSMOUTH, QUITSNA, SAINT JOHNS, SHARON, SMITHFIELD, SUFFOLK, VALHALLA, VIRGINIA BEACH, WILLIAMSBURG, WINDSOR, AND YORKTOWN.
